entities: Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS)
summary:
The Security Council,

Recalling previous resolutions on Liberia and the subregion, 
Welcoming the Secretary-General's report of 8 August 2007, 

Extending UNMIL's mandate until 30 September 2008, 

Reaffirming intention to authorize troop redeployment between UNMIL and UNOCI, 

Endorsing reduction of 2,450 military personnel and 498 police officers, 

Requesting the Secretary-General to monitor progress on core benchmarks and report by a date six months following adoption, 

Intending to review further reductions by 30 September 2008, 

Decides to remain seized of the matter.
